post.body: - cool for kids :) - both my kids were blown away, especially by the characters walking around the exhibition.
- where is the love for your designer. Your designer is like a unique snowflake
- congrats proud mum!
"How many words for a 35-40 minute keynote? Roughly." - no more than three!
- same here - invoicing and time sheets. yummo :(
- great photos!
- I say take off and nuke the entire barn from orbit. That's the only way to be sure. Just like Ripley says!
- a typo - god forbit! Take it off the shelves!
You argued with people at #webblast? Surely not! That would be so much against your nature! ;)
I can't wait for the song you have been practicing. You come on stage around 7:30pm for your "ode to Chicago"?
not till 6pm :)
well done!!!!
- agree :)
- be there, hear your name, that is all :)
- yahhhhhhhhhhhh - books arrived
- well you did leave it a little late
- you were fine. /and yres, free beer and heat are quite a combo!
- I'l buy flamingskulls off you for 7mill !
can you be more specific? disabled how?
- happy 30 -all down hill from here.
- yes, like kidneys - a spare ;)
-excellent stuff - and this - http://tinyurl.com/5s23lk
- happy birthday for one hour from now! Get better! Can't be sick on your birthday
just a knee :)
- make sure you watch "covered in bees!"
ummm... in about 4 hours time when this fun little design job is wrapped up.. :)
- just embrace your mediocrity like the rest of us.
- in your case, being a uber genius, there is possibly 2 good ideas inside you... but no more... in my case, none.
- cos we all have one great idea inside us. The rest is just air.
- ask him to say "Canonicalization" - that's what I do when my kids are getting too smart for their own good ;)
- http://www.channel4.com/life/microsites/G/gayometer/gayometer.html
- yes. I am an idiot. didn't click next screen. Am only 48% gay it seems. Which is sad.
- I'm 100% gay according to the survey. Who would have figured!
-that and carrier pigeons. They have saved me on many occassions.
- can you video the process - sounds both fascinating and horrid!
cough rage
- so you inherited the empathy gene?
- I shall ;)
Sadly, all gone :(
- Cool! Lots more data needed. I am not a fan of signup, prefer join, but it comes down to sites, chocies, audiences :)
- eat your foot! An easy access source of food
- what about street fighters days: punch, punch, head-butt, knee to groin, yawn, punch :)
- great idea!
-you'll have to enlighten me then - being a nob. "pwn" always meant "own" to me - http://bit.ly/mm6r
- he owns us? Are we his slaves? When did this happen?
- god, you have had them too? The insanity of xmas (rampant consumerism) unfolds.
- holy shit - where did you find that? Freaky!
not sunday till sun comes up :) plus i have kids (+ two other kids) all tomorrow while anna xmas shops so dont want to do any work.
have fun!
how was rally?
I'm head of catering
- i bet the duck feels worse... ;)
congrats!
- noooo. Work work work!
- very sad, hang in there.
good post, sir!
- very sad
- that's a rare episode where Henry Rollins comes to visit when someone orders a self-beating ;)
- just kill you now? What's your address and I'll pop over after dinner. Be careful what you order: http://bit.ly/ZvNI
- music and shopping frenzy - cannot stand purchasing things... :(
Control Your Bedroom Lights With Twitter - http://bit.ly/15idD
Aussies Hit the Streets Over Gov't Internet Filters - http://bit.ly/XVE8 - #nocleanfeed
interveiw re starwars exhibition here: http://www.abc.net.au/pm/content/2008/s2437066.htm
Saw 5 web geeks at StarWars opening last night: @magia3e, @broccolini (and friend), @halans, @RadicaRaeves ... were there others?
up and gritty eyed. lots of work today - especially after an unproductive day yesterday
RT @200ok: conroy sleeps through debate. this guy keeps kicking goals... http://tinyurl.com/69rce3
sick as a dog (which is rather an odd saying) :(
more squid stories: the most massive eye, the largest eye in the animal kingdom - http://www.abc.net.au/worldtoday/content/2008/s2434208.htm
Presentation to all Museum staff today. Should I present butt-naked? These are the burning questions we all ask ourselves in the morning.
This weeks links for light resding - for those who are bored: http://tinyurl.com/658ehl
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snowclone
have you ever used a snowclone in a conversation?
Just learned that we are about to have three additional kids for the afternoon. Joyness.
Odd. Went back to bed at 8:30am. Slept till 12:30pm. That's more than I have on many nights!
Awake to find cannot move leg at all and still no voice. I feel old. And crippled. Spare knee, anyone?
back home from #webbast - still have flu. Lost voice completely. Also knee is so sore it wont bend. Basically a wreck. A sober wreck.
cool tool - forgive if it has been tweeted before: http://labs.ideeinc.com/multicolr/
#webblast sydney - those that come along could win one of 10 books: http://www.flickr.com/photos/russweakley/3082986031/
done bugger all this weekend. most of time with leg up, cleaning house or separating fighting kids.
damn. just getting voice back but cant bend knee at all. WTF? Time to cut leg off?
putting kids to bed early as they spent last night at a NIDA Hogwarts evening and then most of today in the pool. Both buggered.
Texting Turnbull catches the Twitter bug - http://bit.ly/3Ldk
a breakfast jingle for the morning - http://www.flickr.com/photos/russweakley/3092984947/
Australia's Internet filtering too ambitious, doomed to fail - http://bit.ly/4frg - #nocleanfeed
Man charged over viral baby-swinging video - interesting legal issues playing out. http://bit.ly/zkvr
time to get rabid kids to bed. They currently scream around the house. I sit in the calm eye of the storm, about to explode into action.
storm rolling in. Harry (our dog) is once again freaked. He's sitting under my desk shaking.
back from the doc - still with two legs. one strapped to buggery. Keyhole surgery is on the cards apparently, to add to long list of opps.
<input type=image disabled="disabled" /> to avoid attribute minimzation? I'm meeting blind guy thursday. will check then if not to ...
heading iff to knee doctor. if he amputates on the spot, I'll try to video and upload asap. Plus, means we can have BBQ leg for dinner!
"I'm covered in bees! Covered in bees!"
Pepsi stirs controversy - but understands social media - http://bit.ly/eVBp
how weird - details about dice and chance: http://bit.ly/V1RT
50 Strange Buildings of the World - http://bit.ly/vwyyb
back from picking up oliver in the rain
The smiley face - a history - http://www.cs.cmu.edu/smiley/
Google releases Chrome 1.0 - http://bit.ly/HgCl
Tell Conroy exactly what you think - http://bit.ly/14CVp - #nocleanfeed
Rally against Internet Censorship in Australia - http://bit.ly/BY4q
RT @factoryjoe: Took your list of terms (http://bit.ly/R2Z6) and made it into a survey. Anyone want to help out? http://tr.im/signin_survey
RT @mollydotcom: W3C Validators in Jeopardy (and what you can do about it): http://tinyurl.com/6lz5q3 Please pass along.
about to finalise museum templates - after making a major desision on some critical terms: http://bit.ly/R2Z6
The W3C has released Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 - http://bit.ly/16t7q - #WCAG2
Have you set up, or are you about to set up a site where users can join/sign in/ register online? What terms do you use - http://bit.ly/R2Z6
lotza work to do but knee is throbbing. wondering if one can work with leg up on table or just chain saw it off altogether.
painful trip home. Smash meant it took over an hour. and a half.. how do people commute each day?
onto Museum templates! Never ending.
got a big site cut tonight but knee is arching. what a pussy.
took dog for late evening walk - or should I say "limp". Knee still fucked. Nice cool evening tho.
house cleaning action. folding cloths - made kids make beds and put on pillow slips. now a vac and mow - depending on knee giving out :(
the power and problems of twitter: http://bit.ly/DcJL
Cory's Comment - ISP Filtering: http://bit.ly/ehog - #nocleanfeed
Labor's proposed ISP filtering: http://bit.ly/aAdG - #nocleanfeed
yahhhh - finished museum job! 3:30am... mmm... kids up in 3-4 hours (unless they sleep in like this morning)
about to sit down and do some more work... after a dreaded carol event etc.
back home from museum - almost wrapped up work... dreading thought of carols event tonight. I cannot stand carols, fuck it! :(
working at Museum for last four hours while bright sun outside. Also missing valueable "kid time"
Cant go to rally as have no walking knee :(
On train with my wild kids. To pick up car.
Internet filter doomed to fail: report - http://bit.ly/IOLB - #nocleanfeed
Opposition scores win over ISP filter report release? - http://bit.ly/70GI - #nocleanfeed
Merry Xmas, Senator - http://bit.ly/xskw - #nocleanfeed
about to drive to Mt Kuringai to pick up something for Anna. I'll be away from you for at least an hour, my computer.
giving cocaine to bees... in the name of sccience :) http://bit.ly/G6sD
MOHAMED HANEEF cleared by report, though politicians inability to apologise or show remorse/compassion makes one sick! http://bit.ly/FkpZ
up early and trying to wrap up some work before kids wake and daily chaos begins
fading here, then realised i have only had 3.5 hours sleep in last 40 hours. :(
back from kids outing into town - santa train and myers store window... kids asleep so back into template cutting.
back home from shopping. Walking thru shops makes me feel unclean.
